Description: Dr. Farhana Ahmed is a highly experienced internal medicine specialist known for her empathetic approach and precise diagnosis in treating chronic illnesses.
Dr. Ahmed Hasan is a leading cardiologist with expertise in treating heart diseases, performing advanced procedures, and offering preventive care.
Dr. Runa Karim specializes in women's health, focusing on prenatal care, childbirth, and gynecological surgeries with a patient-first approach.
Dr. Saiful Islam is a skilled orthopedic surgeon with expertise in joint replacement, fracture treatment, and sports injuries.
Dr. Tasnim Hossain is a compassionate pediatrician dedicated to providing exceptional care to children, ensuring their healthy growth and development.
